title: [BUG] Publishing ASP.NET MVC app copies native libraries to wrong folder #1413 [Need to remove duplicate dlls from root or bin folder]
body: Publishing the ASP.NET MVC app copies native libraries to the wrong folder reported in #1413. It increases the size of the build and the time needed for the pipeline to copy that build each time. We need to remove duplicate Dlls from either root or bin folder.
